subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jamaal Tatum and Matt Shaw each scored 19 points Friday as No. 11 Southern Illinois won their 12th in a row, 71-59 against Drake in the quarterfinals of the Missouri Valley Conference tournament.
snippet: Jamaal Tatum and Matt Shaw each scored 19 points Friday as No. 11 Southern Illinois won their 12th in a row, 71-59 against Drake in the quarterfinals of the Missouri Valley Conference tournament.
